    Go

    • Attestation and Verification Services

      Unified services and solutions for end-to-end attestation and verification of documents with relevant authorities.
      View
      • Document Attestation
        India
        Get assistance for document Attestation, Legalisation, Authentication or Translation requirements
      • Document Attestation
        UAE
        Get assistance for document Attestation, Legalisation, Authentication or Translation requirements
      • Finland (Verification services)
        Nigeria
      • Canadian RCMP Finger Printing Services
        Get your RCMP Canadian Certified Criminal Record Certificate processed within 10 business days! (Available in China & UAE, USA)
      • Document Attestation
        Oman
        Get assistance for document Attestation, Legalisation, Authentication or Translation requirements

    • Migration Services

      Application and biometric enrolment services for Foreign National Registration, Work Permits and Residence Permits.
      View
      • Overseas Workers Resource Centre (OWRC)
        India
        Get information on any matters related to emigration and resolution for any grievances
      • Department of Home Affairs
        South Africa
        Get your South African permit and visa renewed across different centers in country
      • Ministry of Health, Dubai
        UAE
        Get your medical examination for your UAE identity card
      • Lesotho in Country
        Lesotho
        Get and extend your residency permit in Lesotho
      • Foreigner Registration
        Ivory Coast
        Get and extend your Ivory Coast Resident Card

    • Public Services

      Vehicle Registration, Birth & Death Certification, Land Registration, Company Registration, e-Governance delivered through one-stop service centres, digital channels and doorstep provision.
      View
      • Dubai Courts
        UAE
        Visit here for any dispute related services, notary services and personal status services
      • House of Justice
        Ukraine
        Get information on all the services provided at Global registration centre by House of Justice
      • Doorstep Delivery of Civic Services
        Delhi, India
        Residents of Delhi can dial 1076 and have a specialised representative visit them at their home for a wide range of civic services
      • Citizen Facilitation Center, Manipur
        Imphal, India
        State-of-the-art center provides wide range of proficiently managed E-district services and a host of sub-services
      • Premium Driving License Application Center
        Port Harcourt, Nigeria
        Premium Driving License Application Center in Port Harcourt to facilitate the National Driver’s License Applications for residents of Nigeria.
      • NIMC - National Identity Number Enrollment
        Enroll for your NIN at nearest NIN Enrolment Center
    • Switzerland Travel Shop
      Discover Enthralling Switzerland! Click here to purchase Swiss Travel Pass, Mountain excursions & more…
    • Tourism Services - All Destinations
      One stop shop for all destinations. Click to book your attractions & tours here

    • Footprint

      Since 2001, we have processed
      over 278,663,009 applications

      We work globally, click on the link to find out more

      • 3353

        Application Centres

      • 149

        Countries of Operation

      • 67

        Client Governments

    • Testimonials

      What our customers say about us

      • I have been in the UAE for around 30+ years and have never experienced this level of convenience. Everything was swift, location is accessible by metro, I could go after office hours to apply for Passport renewal and staff was super friendly. It is a great news for all my fellow Filipino overseas workers in UAE that our Government has tied-up with a reputable partner.

        Leonida

        UAE

      • What a great place to get my Ghanaian passport renewed! From my point of entry, through to the submission of my documents to the point where I left the VFS Global Centre, I felt welcomed and well received. I highly recommend this place to all who needs services regarding their passport applications!

        George Obeng-Akrofi

        USA

      • Amazing effort! An unparalleled support provided by VFS Global staff during this season not with standing your hectic work pressure.

        Kalakara Dehury

        India

      • It was a fantastic experience. I commend the professionalism, service orientation and attention to detail of the VFS Global staff.

        M.S. Raghavan

        India

      • The ability to balance traveller visa and fulfil the consulate requirements required a high level of diligence and human touch; the team at VFS are able to deliver both.

        Arun Lazaran

        India

      • VFS Global has been giving my team exceptional support and customer service, especially during the peak months of summer.

        Asim Arshad

        UAE
